message:
Rounding up all the blogs focusing on building webapps. Turns out, I'm having trouble finding many; most javascript blogs are in the weeds or on the bleeding edge, not many with their sights set on building large apps: just the 11 I got so far. 

What am I missing?

Current feeds:

* AddyOsmani.com 
* Thomas Reynolds - Award Winning Fjords
* Backbone Tutorials
* Boris Smus
* FunctionSource
* Rebecca Murphey - Adventures in JavaScript Development
* SitePen Blog
* Tagneto
* derick_bailey - ThoughtStream.new
* Tim Branyen @tbranyen
* Tom Dale
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Google Reader - frontend-webapps
caption: google.com
description: …Exponential growth is seductive, starting out slowly and virtually unnoticeably, but beyond the knee of the curve it turns explosive and profoundly transformative. The future is widely misunderstood…
